item.description:
Hola Fanáticos del Español!!!! Tu hablas español bien? Tu hablas español asi asi? Tu hablas español un poquito? Come and join us once again for a general Spanish Conversation workshop event in which you will be grouped by level in order to practice with your conversational skills while enjoying a delicious sandwich or pastry or any other favorite snack or drink. This event will start a 5:30pm sharp and end at 7:30pm. Schedule of this event is as follows: 5:30 pm: Welcome and informal introductions and mingling; participants approach the counter to purchase their favorite drink and/or food; participants enjoy their drinks and/or food 6:00 pm: Participants are grouped by level (beginner, intermediate and advanced) 6:15pm: Participants find their group peers and start talking about topics of interest 7:15pm: Participants mingle with people from other groups 7:30pm: Event ends Participants will be asked to change partners every 10 minutes from 6:15pm to 7:30pm so that they get to know and practice with each other. Some suggest topics of discussion include: Beginner Conversational Spanish - Tu familia - Tu trabajo - Tus pasatiempos (hobbies) - ... Intermediate Conversational Spanish - Cine - Libro favorito - Latino America - ... Advanced Conversational Spanish - Calentamiento global - Derechos humanos - Recursos naturales - ... This workshop will be moderated by Guilianna, Assistant Organizer and Spanish tutor at Spanish Black Belt, leading Spanish language school servicing Boston MA. Please consult your tutor and moderator about any doubts that you may run into while talking with other participants. 


--------

This is an event organized by SpanishBlackBelt Language School. Space is limited to 20 participants so please RSVP quickly enough to secure a seat. Please remember to buy something to support this venue so that we can continue meeting here. Pastries or other snacks are amazing at this place.

If you cannot make it to this workshop, or would prefer to attend a more regular class, please click here to access all Small Group sessions currently being offered by Spanish Black Belt.
item.how_to_find_us: Inside Panera Bread. We will have a poster of Spanish Blackbelt Boston
item.why:
Speak Spanish is fun! Spanish expand your universe! Knowing how to speak Spanish will enable you to help others :)!
Learning Spanish will allow you to better appreciate Hispanic cultural contributions.
item.name: CONVERSATIONAL SPANISH WORKSHOP in Boston
